question: i know this sounds retarded, but do you think making yourself go hungry will aid in losing a pot?
question_content: i know this sounds retarded, but do you think making yourself go hungry will aid in losing a pot?

answers.answer_content: you shouldnt have to make yrself go hungry to lose weight. im on a programme and i never feel hungry and im losing
First you do sound retarded, you would have to" let yourself go hungry" for about three weeks to start losing your" pot".

hi.you wont lose weight this way.if you starve your self ,your body will just store fat and you will probably bloat.eat plenty of fruit and veg.cabbage is great for losing weight.it has no calories.it doesn't taste very nice tho.you could add something to it.just eat smaller portions of food.if you try and lose weight fast you will put the weight on just as quick.hope this helps

NO, you're body will adjust it's metabolism to compensate for the reduction in calories. You could actually gain more fat in the end. The best way is to exercise and eat properly, high fiber, low fat and protein.
if u go hungry then you could be slowing your metabolism down
it might help alittle but dont starve yourself. it is a really bad idea.
